title: Perfect banking experience
text: I really love the banking experience on Revolut. It’s easy to move funds around even if sending between multiple countries. Fast.

title: Outstanding!!!
text: Solved my travel issues and concerns. This company knows how to conduct business!! I will be with them for life now.

title: Amazing all
text: Love the interface. It is easy to use. Revolut also helps me send money internationally in a very easy way

title: Best exchange system
text: If you travel, you must have Revolut

title: Reliable and effective
text: Had issues with rival providers, and always able to get Revolut tranfers complete without delay and excessive added expense.- a much needed banking application for international transfer peace of mind.

title: Reliable Banking
text: I’ve used this bank for many months now and not been disappointed at any time. 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻

title: Love this app! Great Bank
text: I keep recommending it to friends

title: 5 star
text: Still the top rated virtual banking app in the UK.

title: Amazing Bank
text: Service is excellent and love the fact that i have multi currencies

Definitely one of my favorite banking institutions. I ordered the metal card and I’m absolutely in love with it. Also the benefits that come with being a metal card holder! I definitely recommend revolt to anyone looking for simple banking with upscale luxury banking! Even if you don’t upgrade to the metal card status. The free banking is also a great way to start out. I wish that they had a rebuild credit card for the upgrade card holders. Also same day mobile deposit. Other than that I’m definitely glad I choose revolt for my mobile banking.

title: To many fees
text:
I like revolut but so meny fees when you buy and the when you sell i think one will be enough that is the only thing i think is wrong plus when you put money back in your account again fee please think about your policy is to much. 

In your response you say it justifies what you do like is only you giving access to crypto like i said check your competitors what they charge. I like revolut and i hope you take in consideration

title: Good service, great app
text: After using the crappy app from my traditional bank for so long, this is a breath of fresh air. The metal upgrade is worth it if you travel.

title: What is next?
text: Thanks for the app os working great so far … when are we going to have the option to buy stocks from United States companies like Royal Caribbean etc ?

title: Latest update has major bugs - now unable to access account
text: The latest update has bugs. I’m told the app still needs updating and am unable to access my account.

title: One of the best…sad to go!
text:
It was one of the best apps I have used. 
As of January people who are from French Polynesia (part of the EU) will no longer be able to use Revolut. Looking for a new app that provides services like Revolut.
